subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: John Wall, who was out when the Knicks easily beat the Wizards earlier in the season, had 21 points on Wednesday to help them snap the Knicks’ five-game winning streak.
snippet: John Wall, who was out when the Knicks easily beat the Wizards earlier in the season, had 21 points on Wednesday to help them snap the Knicks’ five-game winning streak.
